bibl.title: Τὸ μέγα βιβλίον. Book-Ends, End-Titles, and Coronides in Papyri with Hexametric Poetry. (American Studies in Papyrology. 48.)
bibl.note: Part 1. Content and methodology of the study: 1. The problem and its relevance; - 2. Collecting the data: the manuscripts analyzed; - 3. Methodology and evidence available. - Part 2. Results: 4. General properties of end-marks in rolls and codices; - 5. End-marks in rolls; - 6. Epic books and hexametric poems in rolls; - 7. End-marks and epic books in codices; - 8. Detached titles and end-titles in other genres: a brief survey; - 9. Conclusions. - Part 3. The database [1-55]. - Appendices. Bibliography. Indices.
